frontmatter.title: Predicting Particle Collision in CERN CMS

node.html: Created a Linear Sequential Model to detect particle collision using CERN CMS Collision Detection data, achieving over 98.88% accuracy

frontmatter.title: Deep Learning Research for FasterRCNN model on Underwater Image Data from the Great Barrier Reef

node.html: The goal of creating a FastRCNN based object detection model was to accurately identify starfish in real-time, trained on underwater videos of coral reefs. The model can accurately identify COTS from video footage and output coordinates of a "bounding box" with the location of the COTS.
Analyzed Tokyo Olympics 2020 data and identifying really interesting patterns such as gender, country and ethnicity diversity across disciplines.
This projects involves generating TV scripts by defining and training a recurrent neural network (deep learning).

frontmatter.title: NephronAI â€” Fighting chronic kidney disease using machine learning

node.html: Built a web-based accessible tool for individuals, practicing physicians, hospitals, to detect chronic kidney disease with 99%+ accuracy based on a Random Forest model, get the underlying cause using Fuzzy logic, and recommended change in lifestyle to help tackle the disease.

frontmatter.title: Alec AI Assist | Fighting fake news using the google assistant

node.html: Alec AI Assist is a voice and text based virtual assistant to help us combat fake news, allowing a user to fact check a news, blog, tweet or SMS and return whether that seems fake or true - all by simply talking to it! It is also available on the Google Assistant.
